Entries.Sun: It's kind of quiet here without Demetrius almost blowing up the house up with his science experiments.#$e#I'm not even sure what he was working on. I think it had something to do with plants.
Entries.Sun2: #$1 RobinDem#One time, Demetrius almost set the house on fire with one of his science experiments. One of his beakers exploded and sent a fireball into the rafters. Thank Yoba I used fire-resistant lacquer when I built the place.$u#$e#Sorry if it smells weird in here, @. Funnily enough, something's burning...

Entries.reject_866: Hmm... when I think of flowers, I think of Evelyn. Maybe you should leave it by her grave.

Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? Penny seems really happy.
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? Penny seems really happy.

Entries.cc_Begin: Hey! I heard that you looked around the Community Center... It'd be great if you could fix that place up. It used to be a really nice building!

Entries.summer_18.001: Nothing bad to report. I feel as healthy as ever.

Entries.Phone_Robin_Open_Rare: Hello? Oh, hi @! *BANG*... Um, one sec... (Muffled Voice: Yoba, why does that door keep flying open on its own?)... Sorry! Yes, I'm open until 5pm today. See you later! *click*

Entries.ScienceHouse_Carpenter_CommunityUpgrade1: ...Huh? You want to upgrade the old trailer? That's a really sweet gesture!^I'll just need 950 wood and 500,000g...
